ComicInfo.Summary:
Eddie Endino, Baltimore's crappiest magic-using hustler, is having the worst day! He's been beaten, hunted, and turned into a dog by fascist space wizards. Now, in order to turn human again, Eddie must navigate a magical underground city, make nice with his rat-controlling witch ex-girlfriend, and keep from being killed by the bounty hunters after him and his teenage demon sidekick. Get ready for more magical mayhem from your new favorite comic!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Mike Norton & Marissa Louise | 1 | B | Cover B | Jenny Frison | 2 |
